title: CUAir GCS
blurb: Building out functionality to refine path planning algorithms, waypoint generation techniques, and facilitate autonomous takeoff and landing.

title: Write on time!
blurb: Networked rendition of JKLM.fun's BombParty. Contestants compete to type a word with a given prefix within time before the bomb goes off.

title: FoundIt!
blurb: Lost and found application developed for 2023 Cornell AppDev Hackathon to reunite students with their misplaced belongings and enable crowdsourcing.

title: Portfolio (you're here!)
blurb: A small project where I share my work, introduce myself, and document things I'm learning along the way. It's a space to grow and explore new ideas.
